3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Situated in the epicenter of Nob Hill, this dramatic sky-high residence features unparalleled infinity views of San Francisco's city lights and the world-renowned Presidio Park all the way to the iconic Palace of Fine Arts and Golden Gate Bridge. Enjoy showstopping sunsets from floor to ceiling windows along with world-class vistas from all living spaces. Premiere finishes and a sleek, modern design blends contemporary living with a timeless setting. Enjoy an unparalleled urban lifestyle in San Francisco's most Parisian-style neighborhood- from the casual European-style neighborhood cafes and the elegantly manicured Huntington Park with its well-known fountain, to the haute-cuisine restaurants and chic night-clubs in some of the world's grandest hotels.*Furniture (including televisions but not art) can also be included with sale for an additional $35,000

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perched up high on Nob Hill you will find this spacious renovated, newly painted co-op apartment in the elegant Comstock, one of San Francisco's most sought-after full service buildings. Urban living at its best! Three (3) bedrooms, (or 2 bd. and a den) 2 baths, large living- and dining areas. Spacious open floor plan. All new kitchen appliances, (incl. Bosch). Abundant closet space throughout (plus sizable extra storage in bldg.). Floor to ceiling windows with sliding doors overlooking idyllic foliage and charming Victorians on tree-lined Priest St. Conveniently located near shopping, fine dining, health clubs, the Comstock offers an exceptional life style; amenities include Common outdoor bldg. wrap-around Terrace, Rooftop Vista Point, 24/7 Front Desk. Security cameras. One car deeded parking space. Guest parking. Short distance to the financial district and Union Square.Public transportation on Clay St.! Live-in management. Open Sat Sun 1-3PM by Appointment only: Call 415 474 0264.
Confidential Remarks: Extraordinary VALUE: Back on the market after summer break, at a $204,000 Price REDUCTION! Please attach Cooperative Purchase Addendum to Purchase Agreement. Sale subject to Co-op Board approval after acceptance. Co-op requires 30% down payment. (No Open Houses). Covid protocol followed. Pre-sale escrow opened with Sylvia Wong, Fidelity National Title, 415 359 2118. Website: www.1333Jones408.com Office Lic.: 01866771 Catharina's Lic.01412882
Directions to Property: 1333 Jones St. is located between Washington St. a

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nestled on a serene block of coveted Nob Hill, this stunning three-bedroom condo is the epitome of luxurious city living. Just one block away from the serene Huntington Park, this home offers a perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. Step inside and you'll be greeted by a bright and airy floor plan, featuring three spacious bedrooms, one full and one powder bathroom, a formal living room, a formal dining room, and an eat-in kitchen equipped with premium SubZero and Viking appliances. Enjoy the convenience of in-home laundry and the peace of mind that comes with one-car garage parking. With low monthly dues of just $400, this home is the perfect combination of comfort and affordability. The prime location of 52 Pleasant offers a coveted walking score, providing easy access to some of San Francisco's best dining, shopping, and entertainment options.
Confidential Remarks: Inquiries: Alex.Hachiya@sir.com or 415-314-6690. Offer date TBD.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: **NEW PRICE NEW YEAR* from $2,295,000 to $1,890,000*** Two Bedroom Two Bath plus Den with quintessential SF views of Coit Tower, TransAmerica Building and Grace Cathedral. This home has ample storage - Each bedroom with it's own walk-in closet plus a large full height storage cage and separate bicycle storage included. Composed of only forty-four residences, many with outdoor rooms and bespoke spatial compositions, Crescent represents the very essence of rare, collectible design in Nob Hill. Designed by world-renowned Robert A.M. Stern Architects, the eight-story development offers exceptional features and amenities for each owner in this boutique building, with interiors designed by Champalimaud. Every building resident enjoys access to the Secret Garden, The SkyLine view roof terrace with outdoor kitchen, the well-equipped Fitness Center with yoga studio, and the double height Drawing Room/Residents' Lounge with fireplace. The exquisite lobby is attended 24-hours and valet parking is available. Photos are representative of this specific home and the development.
Confidential Remarks: This would be a rare opportunity for your clients to purchase a newly constructed home in Nob Hill designed by Robert A.M. Stern with impeccable finishes.
Directions to Property: On California St. between Powell & Stockton Sts.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: There are unobstructed south and west views and a south facing balcony off the living room. This apartment has been nicely remodeled and is in move-in condition. There is a spacious entry foyer, powder room, and a bar with wine refrigerator. The elegant living room has a gas-burning fireplace. The grand master suite has an abundance of closet space as does the 2nd bedroom which would also make a great office. Building amenities include 24-hour doorman, on-site management, a health club with indoor pool, jacuzzi, sauna, equipped exercise room and the Osso Steak House is on the lobby level. A few steps away there is Huntington Park, restaurants, a grocery, and world-class hotels.
Confidential Remarks: The monthly assessment of $1,939 includes professional property management, 24-hour door person, window cleaning, health club use, parking, and all utilities (heat, electricity, cable TV, internet) except telephone.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: A rare find on Nob Hill, this two-bedroom apartment features a 1,200 sq ft (approx.) terrace, enabling gracious indoor/outdoor living within a full-service 24-hour doorman building. Westward facing, the terrace invites you to host dinners and celebrations, while supplying postcard-perfect San Francisco sunsets. Ideal for an urban gardener or a devoted pet owner, this rarely found outdoor space accommodates you. Inside the 1,800 sq.ft (approx.) of living space, a wall of floor-to-ceiling windows bathes the open living, dining & kitchen areas in natural light, seamlessly connecting rooms to the outdoors. The primary and guest bedrooms also share this view, while a spacious walk-in closet with laundry and two full baths complete this unique layout. Sophisticated infrastructure includes recently installed in-home laundry, hardwood flooring, Lutron-controlled recessed lighting and Sonos sound systems. Providing the ultimate in City location near favorite restaurants and supermarkets, Mid-Century Modern 1200 California thrives amid the vibrance of Nob Hill and includes the services of a 24/7 door-staff & attended lobby, on-site residential manager, maintenance and engineering staffs, garage parking for one car, storage locker, and a ﬁtness center.
Confidential Remarks: For more information or to schedule a private tour, please email Kevin Delmore at kevin.delmore@sothebys.realty

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: The very best 3BR at the top of Nob Hill in Gramercy Towers with views of the Grace Cathedral, Huntington Park and downtown. The Living Room, Dining Area and Primary Bedroom are virtually staged. There is an attractive gated and landscaped courtyard with free short-term parking. Amenities include 24-hour doormen, on site management and a health club with an indoor pool, equipped exercise area, jacuzzi and sauna. In addition, there is Osso, the preeminent San Francisco steakhouse. The HOA Fee includes heat, electricity, cable TV, earthquake insurance and parking. Easy walking to Whole Foods, Trader Joe's, financial district and Union Square.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Enjoy dazzling views of iconic San Francisco landmarks spanning two centuries and the glittering Skyline from a premiere 24-hour doorman high-rise on glamorous Nob Hill... from Grace Cathedral to Huntington Park to Salesforce Towerfrom the Pyramid to Coit Tower to the Bay...and more... This super-sophisticated 3 bedroom, 3 bath residence optimizes an extra-large dramatic open living/ dining space, perfect for entertaining with the stunning views as a fabulous backdrop, as well as for a casual contemporary everyday lifestyle. A charming breakfast area off the kitchen and an expansive all-glass enclosed Southeast terrace are additional amenities of the beautifully laid-out floorplan. Experience an enjoyable urban lifestyle in the City's world-famous Parisian-style historic neighborhood- with close proximity to world-class hotels, dining, shopping, cultural and theater attractions- as well as the tech and A.I. capital of the world in the Downtown, Jackson Square, FiDi & SOMA!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Luxury Nob Hill 2br/2ba Top Floor Condominium with SF landmark & Bay views. Newly constructed in 2005, this light filled home features 4 syklights, hardwood floors, crown molding, granite counters, chef's kitchen, stainless steel appliances, security system, surround sound, in-unit laundry and 1 car parking. A modern building in a quintessential San Francisco location. Directly situated on 2 cable car lines and walking distance to North Beach, Russian Hill, Chinatown, Financial District, Downtown, and the Muni subway. Located on the 3rd floor of a non-elevator building with wide staircases. This building has an extraordinary roof deck with spectacular 360 degree views.
Confidential Remarks: 3% buyer's agent Commission. Shown by appointment Contact Omari at 415-205-8101 or omari@vanguardsf.com 939jackson.com

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Perched at the top of one of San Francisco's most iconic neighborhoods, this high-floor luxury residence enjoys un- paralleled views of the tree-lined hills of Southern Marin, shimmering streets of San Francisco's North Bay and glistening Golden Gate Bridge. A thoughtful living space creates a private sanctuary for any lifestyle to enjoy. Experience luxury living and all the amenities of a Nob Hill premiere 24-hour doorman building from an inspiring, ever-changing setting. Immerse yourself in the unmatched urban lifestyle of San Francisco's most Parisian-style neighborhood- from the casual European-style neighborhood cafes and the elegantly manicured Huntington Park with its well-known fountain, to the haute-cuisine restaurants and chic night-clubs in some of the world's grandest hotels. Its location in the heart of the City is close to booming world-class tech and financial centers of Jackson Square, the Financial District and SoMa, as well as the internationally acclaimed shopping and dining of Union Square and Downtown, as well as the Broadway-style entertainment of the Theater District- a quintessential San Francisco lifestyle at the center of one of its most vibrant historical neighborhoods!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to Residence 904 at the Comstock, San Francisco's premier Mid Century Modern cooperative-apartment building. This 1,323 sq.ft. 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment boasts floor to ceiling windows, a large terrace and a one-of-a-kind view of downtown San Francisco and The Bay Bridge. The floorplan allows for gracious entertaining with a chef's kitchen including Subzero refrigerator, built-in oven and microwave and granite countertops. Bedrooms are generous; the secondary bedroom is adjacent to the living room and showcases a retractable wall, allowing for expansion of the entertainment space. The primary suite is sized to accommodate a king bed with ample room for nightstands (and other furniture as pleased) and offers a bathroom with double sinks, walk-in shower and copious closets. Residence also includes 1 car garage parking and private storage room. Building amenities include full-time staff (door-attendants, manager, etc.), third-floor community room and community terrace.
Confidential Remarks: Fabulous with breathtaking views! No open houses. Contact Ed for showings, 415.350.9083. Financing available through NCB, Jeremy Morgan 415.238.5904/jmorgan@ncb.coop - 30% min. down per cooperative rules.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Video Tour! 1177 California, Unit 1602 is an efficient, remodeled, junior one-bedroom with exceptional Twin Peaks, City and Golden Gate Bridge views. Gramercy Towers, located on the top of iconic Nob Hill on the cable car line across the street from Grace Cathedral and Huntington Park, is a premier San Francisco condominium building with 24-hour doormen and amenities that make for secure and effortless living. Amenities include on-site management, doormen, indoor pool, gym, spa and sauna. HOA Fees include heat, electricity, cable TV, internet, earthquake insurance and parking. Laundry is located on each residential level. The Osso Steakhouse is on the lobby level. The Masonic Auditorium is next door. Easy accessibility to transportation, shopping, Union Square and downtown.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Positioned atop Nob Hill The Gramercy Towers is a premier condominium building. Apartment No.324 has unobstructed south and east views of San Francisco. The elegant and spacious living room has a gas-burning fireplace and dramatic city views and has an adjacent elegant dining area. The primary bedroom has abundant closet space and roomy bathroom. The large second bedroom which would also make a great office also has large closets. Gramercy towers located within steps of Huntington Park, restaurants, grocery stores and world-class hotels.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: This 4BD/3.5BA condo in Lower Nob Hill boasts an open floor plan with ample natural light, high ceilings, and a private rooftop terrace complete with a BBQ and fire pit. Enjoy breathtaking city views from this 2013-built unit, which is located in a small, luxurious building with a private elevator, multiple balconies, and central air conditioning. The main level features a spacious dining and living area with white oak floors, an open kitchen, and four bedrooms, including a master suite. The home also includes custom built-in desks and cabinets for a comfortable at-home work environment, as well as remote-controlled blinds throughout. Conveniently located near many shops and restaurants with a high Walk Score and Transit Score, and comes with a deeded parking spot.

Remarks: Having undergone a comprehensive remodel until the guidance of Chantal Lamberto Design & Located atop Nob Hill, 1200 California is an iconic residence with a prime location near cable cars, major hotels, Grace Cathedral, and myriad restaurants. Apartment 19C, with 2 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, spanning approximately 1,970 sq.ft., offers unparalleled panoramic views from Coit Tower to the Transamerica Pyramid. This rarely available high-floor unit epitomizes San Francisco living, featuring an open layout with a large living room, expanded dining area, family room, and an updated chef's kitchen. The primary suite boasts spectacular downtown views and a split bathroom with dual vanities.
